nodes.text: The Daruvvia system was located in the Lorelli Reach, an area of the Hapes Cluster in the Slice portion of the Inner Rim. It was connected by the hyperlane known as the Lorell Route to the Ket and Sennex systems.
The Daruvvia system was home to the creatures known as vhorks and was the origin point of the beverage known as Daruvvian champagne.
The Daruvvia system was introduced in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square O-9.
